inapplicable.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly

inapplicable.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

inapplicable.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

nodes.html: We invite researchers, developers, or enthusiasts to contribute to PlasticDB. We are planning on releasing new features and increasing our literature coverage. Please contact us at contact.plasticdb@gmail.com if you think you can help. Thank you! :)

nodes.html: The database currently has 633 species of microorganisms that were reported in the scientific literature to have plastic-degrading capabilities and 212 proteins described to breakdown plastics.

nodes.html: We invite researchers, developers, or enthusiasts to contribute to PlasticDB. We are planning on releasing new features and increasing our literature coverage. Please contact us at contact.plasticdb@gmail.com if you think you can help. Thank you! :)

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: The database currently has 633 species of microorganisms that were reported in the scientific literature to have plastic-degrading capabilities and 212 proteins described to breakdown plastics.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: The database is updated bimonthly to keep up with new publications and reports of plastic biodegradation. There are several options for using the data in the database:

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Get information about the proteins that degrade each type of plastic (Proteins)

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Annotate a single protein and find out if it matches any of the proteins in the database (Annotate gene)

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Annotate a whole genome or metagenome (Annotate genome)

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Annotate and compare genomes or metagenomes (Compare genomes)

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Download a spreadsheet with all information about the microorganisms or download a fasta file with all the protein sequences (Download)

nodes.html: If you have any information about microorganisms and proteins that we could use to improve the database, please submit a request to add, remove, or modify. You can also leave any comments in this form and we will get back to you.
